NameTooShort3: Name must be at least 3 characters long
NameTooLong255: Name must be at most 255 characters long
FirstNameTooShort1: First name must be at least 1 character long
FirstNameTooLong50: First name must be at most 50 characters long
LastNameTooShort1: Last name must be at least 1 character long
LastNameTooLong50: Last name must be at most 50 characters long
AbbrTooShort1: Abbreviation must be at least 1 character long
AbbrTooLong10: Abbreviation must be at most 10 characters long
SearchValueTooShort3: Search value must be at least 3 characters long
SearchValueTooLong50: Search value must be at most 50 characters long
LicenseTooShort1: License must be at least 1 character long
LicenseTooLong20: License must be at most 20 characters long
